cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.CC 

The paper deals with online learning algorithms and linear prediction, which are topics commonly studied in the machine learning community. The use of convex and compact domains also suggests a connection to optimization and control theory, which are often studied in the information theory and control theory sub-categories. The paper's focus on regularities and curvature also suggests a connection to geometry and topology, which are often studied in the data structures and algorithms sub-category.
